title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body:
Hexakill again? Where's the game mode that almost everybody wants...
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Welp, no urf... I guess we have to wait. Atleast we have nemesis draft returning.
riot is retarded why no urf

Fuck Riot. They're scumbags who deserve all the hate they get
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF WE WANT URF
Upvote

Clearly URF and doom bots are the most popular requests, since RITO don't seem to want to put them in the queue regularly. Is there a specific reason?

I appreciate them wanting to boost other game modes that are boring and otherwise stagnant, but making them every 4th week doesn't make them any better. If ascension was once every few months then sure, I'd play it more often as it'd be a 'rare commodity'
When is urf back! URF IS THE BEST GAMEMODE. BRING BACK URF
just logged in to play all for one and its not showing up any suggestions
Rotating game modes are only available after 11am Aest time.
Rito we appreciate all the game modes but we just want urf{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Hey riot, Just wanted to let you know that the new Nexus seize mode was kinda a flop in my opinion, i believe it was because a lot of champions kits were just not suited for it and too me it just wasn't enjoyable. 

I feel that the Bridge-water event where you got to upgrade and change lane minions is really simple yet more fun and complicated due to the fact that you had to be offensive and defensive at the same time and think that makes a better game for ROTATED GAME MODE

suggestion as well, you should look at a game type mode where its mirror all for one URF on the howling abyss map, i feel it would be super fun, hectic and yet balanced because both teams would have the exact same tools being the same champs.

and on a final note for the love of god PLEASE BRING BACK DOOM BOTS!!!!!
{{item:3151}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Doom Bots please
8 champ selects, I've gotten riven as a one for all pick. Every time someone has dodged.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
It sucks... i play any champ that gets selected but every time the ones i want get selected someone dodges...
I also want Urf! but Acention is my favourite{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:143}}
bring urf on, i have never gotten a chance to play it :(
why is it not in my list??

hey, at least the kinda listened they gave us the worst of the best, still give us urf once a month at least.
before i quit this game, whatever not like rito cares all they do is chat ban me for telling my team that their bad.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Forever waiting for Doom Bots
Riot noone will play any gamemode (Maybe except for nemesis draft) until you return urf
Riot.. are you sure its random ?cause atm getting urf is like winning the lotto, 1 to 3.5 millionth of a chance {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
wtf one for all isnt showing up for me {{champion:32}}
